io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util

Class TracingCorePublisher<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util.TracingPublisher<T>
      • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util.TracingCorePublisher<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of element signaled
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.async.publisher.Publishers.MicronautPublisher<T>, org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>, reactor.core.CorePublisher<T>

    public class TracingCorePublisher<T>
extends TracingPublisher<T>
implements reactor.core.CorePublisher<T>
    The tracing publisher that supports Reactor's context.
    Author:
    Denis Stepanov
